Зарплатная аналитика по вакансиям и резюме.

**Должность:** 1С программист (ERP).

**Источники данных:** hh.ru.

**Регионы:** Москва, Московская область.

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(kableExtra)
a <- read_csv("1C_Программист_Resume_04.2024.csv")
```

### Резюме

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### Колличество данных

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
p1 <- colSums(!is.na(a[1]))
p2 <- colSums(!is.na(a[2]))
p5 <- sum(a$Офис, na.rm = T)
p6 <- sum(a$Удалённо, na.rm = T)
p7 <- sum(a$Гибрид, na.rm = T)

p <- tibble("Senior" = p1, "Senior+" = p2, "Офис" = p5, "Удалённо" = p6, "Гибрид" = p7)

kbl(p) |> 
  kable_material()
```

#### Таблица данных

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
kbl(a) |> 
  kable_material(c("striped", "hover")) |> 
  kableExtra::scroll_box(height = "400px")
```

:::
  
```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| out-width: 100%

a1 <- a |> 
  select("Senior", "Senior +")

a1 <- gather(a1)

ggplot(a1, mapping = aes(key, value, color = key)) +
  geom_boxplot(outlier.colour = "red", notch=FALSE) +
  geom_jitter(shape=16, position=position_jitter(0.2)) +
  facet_grid() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette="Set2") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = " ") +
  labs(y = " ") +
  scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(n.dodge = 2)) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = comma) +
  guides(color = FALSE)
```

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false

knitr::kable(summary(a[1:2]))
```

:::
  
```{r}
#| warning: false
#| echo: false
#| out-width: 100%

s <- gather(senior[ ,1])
s1 <- gather(senior1[ ,1])

s$key <- paste0("Senior")
s1$key <- paste0("Senior+")

#q <- rbind2(j1, m1, by="key", all.x=T, sort=F)
#q1 <- rbind2(s1, t1, by="key", all.x=T, sort=F)
q2 <- rbind2(s, s1, by="key", all.x=T, sort=F)

ggplot(q2, mapping = aes(key, value, color = key)) +
  geom_boxplot(outlier.colour = "red", notch=FALSE) +
  geom_jitter(shape=16, position=position_jitter(0.2)) +
  facet_grid() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette="Set2") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = " ") +
  labs(y = " ") +
  scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(n.dodge = 2)) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = comma) + 
  guides(color = FALSE)
```
